name: NFT-Performance: [ r e ] b o r n
description:
The idea: by purchasing this one artwork for your collection, you will receive three arts, but not immediately. You will receive the second and third versions on the day of purchase in 2022 and 2023.
Only you and me will have this triptych, there will be no other versions, it's exclusive. 

In this way, I will show through the same topic the evolution of my path as an NFT-artist. And you will conduct an experiment, how the picture will live its second and third reborn. This is an investment in the long-term living of the aftertaste from the art you have acquired, when your investment is not in an instant result, but in a process and result in time.

If you saw the light in my performance and want to save it - do it. It's worth it.

If you are not pure in heart and thoughts and want to use your acquisition in some dirty way, pass by, the punishment for your dishonor will be much higher than the money spent. It's not worth it.

With grace I transfer my child to digital consciousness. I believe that it will go into the right hands.
